text: Kraft Foods () is a business that makes packaged food. They own Oscar Mayer. It was started in 2012 as a spin-off of Mondelez. It was bought by H.J. Heinz in 2015. == Other websites == * Kraft Corporate Website * Kraft Foods Inc. Fact Sheet from Hoover's Category:1903 establishments in the United States Category:1900s establishments in Illinois Category:American food companies Category:Companies based in Illinois
title: Kraft Foods
